function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if (id == '3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264') then if (text == "char.stats" or text == "char.maxstats" or text == "char.vitals" or text == "char.worth" or text == "char.status") then res, gmcparg = CallPlugin("3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264","gmcpval","char") --- We just want the gmcp.char section. luastmt = "gmcpdata = " .. gmcparg assert (loadstring (luastmt or "")) () end -- GMCP call end -- GMCP Plugin I.D
if (text == "comm.quest") then
res, gmcparg = CallPlugin("3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264", "gmcpval", "comm") luastmt = "gmcpdata = " .. gmcparg assert (loadstring (luastmt or "")) () local action = gmcpval("quest.action") if (action == "start") then function Initialize() start_time = os.time() end -- Function Initialize Initialize() elseif (action == "comp") then quest_counter = quest_counter +1 function time_taken(seconds) finish_time = os.time() local seconds = tonumber(finish_time-start_time) if seconds <= 0 then return "00:00:00"; else hours = math.floor(seconds/3600) mins = math.floor(seconds/60 - (hours*60)) secs = math.floor(seconds - hours*3600 - mins *60) if mins == 0 then if secs == 1 then Note ("Quest Completed For : ", last_quest_total, " QP. It Took ", secs, " second.") elseif secs > 1 then Note ("Quest Completed For : ", last_quest_total, " QP. It Took ", secs, " seconds.") end end if mins == 1 then if secs == 0 then Note ("Quest Completed For : ", last_quest_total, " QP. It Took ", mins, " minute : ", secs, " seconds.") elseif secs == 1 then Note ("Quest Completed For : ", last_quest_total, " QP. It Took ", mins, " minute : ", secs, " second.") elseif secs > 1 then Note ("Quest Completed For : ", last_quest_total, " QP. It Took ", mins, " minute : ", secs, " seconds.") end end if mins > 1 then if secs == 0 then Note ("Quest Completed For : ", last_quest_total, " QP. It Took ", mins, " minutes : ", secs, " seconds.") elseif secs == 1 then Note ("Quest Completed For : ", last_quest_total, " QP. It Took ", mins, " minutes : ", secs, " second.") else Note ("Quest Completed For : ", last_quest_total, " QP. It Took ", mins, " minutes : ", secs, " seconds.") end end end end
if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.totqp")) == nil then last_quest_total = tonumber(0) else last_quest_total = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.totqp")) end if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.qp")) == nil then last_quest_base = tonumber(0) else last_quest_base = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.qp")) end if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.mccp")) == nil then last_quest_mccp = tonumber(0) else last_quest_mccp = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.mccp")) end if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.lucky")) == nil then last_quest_lucky = tonumber(0) else last_quest_lucky = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.lucky")) end if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.tierqp")) == nil then last_quest_tier = tonumber(0) else last_quest_tier = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.tierqp")) end if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.pracs")) == nil then last_quest_practices = tonumber(0) else last_quest_practices = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.pracs")) end if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.trains")) == nil then last_quest_trains = tonumber(0) else last_quest_trains = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.trains")) end if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.tp")) == nil then last_quest_tp = tonumber(0) else last_quest_tp = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.tp")) end if tonumber (gmcpval("quest.gold")) == nil then last_quest_gold = tonumber(0) else last_quest_gold = tonumber (gmcpval("quest.gold")) end
ColourNote ("yellow", "red", "QUEST TRACKER") ColourNote ("yellow", "red", "TOTAL QP : " .. last_quest_total) ColourNote ("green", "", "base qp : " .. last_quest_base) ColourNote ("green", "", "MCCP : " .. last_quest_mccp) ColourNote ("green", "", "lucky : " .. last_quest_lucky) ColourNote ("green", "", "tier bonus : " .. last_quest_tier) ColourNote ("green", "", "practices : " .. last_quest_practices) ColourNote ("green", "", "trains : " .. last_quest_trains) ColourNote ("green", "", "tp : " .. last_quest_tp) ColourNote ("green", "", "gold : " .. last_quest_gold)
time_taken() qp_grand_total = qp_grand_total + last_quest_total qp_average = qp_grand_total / quest_counter Note ("average of : ", qp_average, " QP per quest over a total of : ", quest_counter, " quests.") end end end -- function onpluginbroadcast
require "gmcphelper" function OnPluginInstall () OnPluginEnable () end function OnPluginEnable () quest_counter = GetVariable ("quest_counter") if quest_counter == nil then SetVariable ("quest_counter", tonumber(0)) end quest_counter = GetVariable ("quest_counter")
qp_grand_total = GetVariable ("qp_grand_total") if qp_grand_total == nil then SetVariable ("qp_grand_total", tonumber(0)) end qp_grand_total = GetVariable ("qp_grand_total")
end function OnPluginSaveState () SetVariable ("quest_counter", quest_counter) SetVariable ("qp_grand_total", qp_grand_total) end
